metadata.title: CVE-2022-23833 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in MultiPartParser in Django 2.2 before 2.2.27, 3.2before 3.2.12, and 4.0 before 4.0.2. Passing certain inputs to multipartforms could result in an infinite loop when parsing files.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-23833` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-django - 2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-django package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:2.2.12-1ubuntu0.10').
